channel.title: floral on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in floral on funPlantGenes

item.title: ACS1G
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G044410 Gene Symbol: ACS1G Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Gain-of-function of the 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase gene ACS1G induces female flower development in cucumber gynoecy.

item.title: BcXTH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcXTH1 Gene Name: Xyloglucan endotransglucosylase/hydrolase1 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: BcXTH1, a Brassica campestris homologue of Arabidopsis XTH9, is associated with cell expansion.

item.title: BjMTP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjMTP1 Gene Name: Putative metal transport protein 1 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: Steady-state mRNA levels of BjMTP1 were found to be enhanced 8.

item.title: BrABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra011485 Gene Symbol: BrABF3 Gene Name: transcription activator ABF3 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: The BrABF3 promoter is specifically active in the Arabidopsis leaf vascular tissue, where CO is mainly expressed.

item.title: CaRAX1;2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaRAX1;2a|SFL Gene Name: SINGLE FLOWER Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: The SINGLE FLOWER (2a|SFL) gene encodes a MYB transcription factor that regulates the number of flowers produced by the inflorescence of chickpea.

item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: B73_RefGen_v3 Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, a target of Cg1 is teosinte glume architecture1 (tga1)1, a gene known to have had a role in the domestication of maize from teosinte.

item.title: CiFD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ciclev10003845m Gene Symbol: CiFD Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor Genome: citrus genome Species: Citrus clementina Functional Descriptions: A bZIP transcription factor (CiFD) regulates drought- and low-temperature-induced flowering by alternative splicing in citrus.

item.title: ClCRY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClCRY2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: ClCRY2 facilitates floral transition in Chrysanthemum lavandulifolium by affecting the transcription of circadian clock-related genes under short-day photoperiods.

item.title: ClWIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla008537 Gene Symbol: ClWIP1 Gene Name: C2H2 zinc finger transcription factor Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: A putative C2H2 zinc finger transcription factor gene, ClWIP1 (gene ID Cla008537), an orthologue of the melon gynoecy gene CmWIP1, was disrupted.

item.title: CmFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmFTL2 Gene Name: flowering locus T-like 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmFTL2 is involved in the photoperiod- and sucrose-mediated control of flowering time in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmNRRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmNRRa Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNRRa, an orthologous gene of OsNRRa that regulates root growth in response to nutrient stress in rice, was identified from Chrysanthemum and its role in flowering time was studied.

item.title: CsDFB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa7G067350 Gene Symbol: CsDFB1 Gene Name: DEFORMED FLORAL BUD1 Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v2 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: We propose that the CsDFB1-CsPHB module represents a regulatory pathway for local auxin distribution that governs floral organogenesis and vascular differentiation in cucumber.

item.title: CsFTL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsFTL3 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T-like 3 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum seticuspe Functional Descriptions: In chrysanthemums, FLOWERING LOCUS T-like 3 (FTL3) has been identified as a floral inducer produced in the leaves after short-day stimuli and transported to the shoot tip.

item.title: CsLFY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G000050.1 Gene Symbol: CsLFY Gene Name: LEAFY Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsLFY is required for shoot meristem maintenance via interaction with WUSCHEL in cucumber.

item.title: CsMYB4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003515.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB4a Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Sg4 member from Camellia sinensis Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB4a works synergistically with CsIAA4 and participates in regulation of the auxin pathway in stamen.

item.title: CsTEN
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_5G039160 Gene Symbol: CsTEN Gene Name: Tendril Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Although expression of two cucumber genes regulating tendril formation, Tendril (CsTEN) and Unusual Floral Organs (CsUFO), was significantly decreased in CsTL knockout lines, these two genes were not direct downstream targets of CsTL.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_4g30710 Gene Symbol: FveFT2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: GmAP1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G091300 Gene Symbol: GmAP1a Gene Name: APETALA1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: APETALA1 (AP1) functions as a class A gene in the ABCE model for floral organ development, helping to specify carpel, stamen, petal, and sepal identities.

item.title: GmAP1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G269800 Gene Symbol: GmAP1b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: APETALA1 (AP1) functions as a class A gene in the ABCE model for floral organ development, helping to specify carpel, stamen, petal, and sepal identities.

item.title: GmAP1d

item.title: GmFT1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G298900 Gene Symbol: GmFT1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmFT1a negatively regulates photoperiodic flowering time.

item.title: GmFT2a;GmFTL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16g150700 Gene Symbol: GmFT2a GmFTL3 GmNN1/FT2a Gene Name: Flowering locus T gene 2a Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variants of FT2a and FT5a confer the long-juvenile (LJ) trait in soybean Selected FT variants repress AP1 and interact to enhance late maturity and yield.

item.title: GmFT5a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G044100 Gene Symbol: GmFT5a Gene Name: Flowering locus T gene 5a Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variants of FT2a and FT5a confer the long-juvenile (LJ) trait in soybean Selected FT variants repress AP1 and interact to enhance late maturity and yield Both FT2a and FT5a show strong induction under SDs, induce early flowering when overexpressed, and delay flowering when downregulated by RNA interference (RNAi).

item.title: GmFUL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G018800 Gene Symbol: GmFUL Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Dt2 functions not only as a direct repressor of Dt1, which prevents terminal flowering, but also as a direct activator of putative floral integrator/identity genes including GmSOC1, GmAP1, and GmFUL, which likely promote flowering.

item.title: GmMYBA3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G262000.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBA3 Gene Name: Genome: Phytozyme 13 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular and genetic studies have characterized two antagonistic regulators, the positive activator GmMYBA3 and the negative repressor GmMYBR1, that modulate the gene expression of anthocyanin biosynthesis in soybean flowers.

item.title: GmMYBR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G247100.1 Gene Symbol: GmMYBR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular and genetic studies have characterized two antagonistic regulators, the positive activator GmMYBA3 and the negative repressor GmMYBR1, that modulate the gene expression of anthocyanin biosynthesis in soybean flowers.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G072750 Gene Symbol: HvCEN Gene Name: CENTRORADIALIS Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Global transcriptome profiling in developing shoot apices and inflorescences of mutant and wild-type plants revealed that HvCEN controlled transcripts involved in chromatin remodeling activities, cytokinin and cell cycle regulation and cellular respiration under LDs and short days, whereas HvCEN affected floral homeotic genes only under LDs.

item.title: WFZP-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G116900 Gene Symbol: WFZP-A Gene Name: FRIZZY PANICLE Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: WFZP is specifically expressed at the sites where the spikelet meristem and floral meristem are initiated, which differs from the expression patterns of its homologs FZP/BD1 in rice and maize, indicative of its functional divergence during species differentiation.
